meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>soul</radical> <radical>long ago</radical> was very <kanji>frugal</kanji>, which is why you get to have too much in this life!
readingMnemonic: You know what being <kanji>frugal</kanji> is? <reading>Sexy</reading> (せき). You save money, you use less resources, that's the sexiest thing I can think of.
